Reviews.Content: except location absolutely nice staff clean cheep 250 euros 5 nights 2 persons theres hotel bathroom breakfast kitchen stayed 226 3 meters 2 meters wide uneven walls entire life bad bed positioned parallel walls perpendicular wall boggles mind clean recently renovated looks youre planning spend time ok internal court yard looks horrible dirty sun light didnt rest morning 7 breakfast starts hear people passing corridor youre light sleeper youll wake worse stay floor reception near sliding door floor 2 hear distance breakfast poor 2 cereals bread butter jelly try pass jam dont pay served dark cash youll pay fee visiting rome 2 dont accept credit card restaurants dont accept credit card saying location excellent youre 12 kilometers tourist attractions fontana di trevi colosseum bocca della etc horrified entered hotel id 23 days figure rome fabulous

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Good Hotel- highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: Samyukth
Reviews.Content: stayed days august hotel minimalistic pay extra air conditioning 10 euros night bathroom tv italian channels location excellent close train station repubblica termini bus stops didnt eat breakfast hotel ok lot restaurants vendors short walk recommend flying rome hotel close termini station direct bus service airport 4 euros person booked exiting airport overall experience stay rome
